targets.target: alias(summarize(sumSeries(stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.send_prescription_notification.order_sms_invitation_was_already_sent.count), '24h', 'sum', false), ' Order already had SMS invitation sent')

alias(summarize(sumSeries(sumSeries(sumSeries(sumSeries(sumSeries(sumSeries(stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.send_prescription_notification.uncaught_error.count, stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.send_prescription_notification.generation_error.invalid_xml.count), stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.send_prescription_notification.order_not_found.count), stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.send_prescription_notification.order_class_not_prescription_or_dme.count), stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.send_prescription_notification.order_subclass_not_new_renewal_or_change.count), stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.send_prescription_notification.ordering_mode_not_prescribed.count), stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.send_prescription_notification.order_has_no_patient_id.count), '24h', 'sum', false), 'Total internal request errors for messages not sent to DrFirst')

alias(summarize(sumSeries(stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.send_prescription_notification.order_class_incorrect.count), '24h', 'sum', false), '--- Order class not Prescription or DME')

alias(summarize(sumSeries(stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.send_prescription_notification.order_subclass_not_new_renewal_or_change.count), '24h', 'sum', false), '--- Order subclass not new, renewal, or change')

alias(summarize(sumSeries(stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.send_prescription_notification.order_has_no_patient_id.count), '24h', 'sum', false), '--- Order has no patient id')

alias(summarize(sumSeries(stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.send_prescription_notification.sms_invite_status_result.ERR.count), '24h', 'sum', false), 'Total response error status codes for messages sent to DrFirst')

alias(summarize(sumSeries(sumSeries(sumSeries(sumSeries(sumSeries(sumSeries(stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.send_check_sms_capabilities.uncaught_error.count, stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.send_check_sms_capabilities.generation_error.invalid_xml.count), stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.send_check_sms_capabilities_update_text_consent.order_not_found.count), stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.send_check_sms_capabilities_update_text_consent.uncaught_error.count), stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.send_check_sms_capabilities.patient_not_found.count), stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.send_check_sms_capabilities.patient_has_no_mobile_phone.count), stats.counters.Clinicals.Production.*.prescription_notification.determine_text_consent.uncaught_error.count), '24h', 'sum', false), 'Total internal request errors for messages not sent to DrFirst')
